component.name: Tabor
component.summary: A tabbed, cross-platform, OpenGL terminal emulator

description.p: Tabor is a tabbed terminal forked from Alacritty that comes with sensible defaults, but allows for extensive configuration. By integrating with other applications, rather than reimplementing their functionality, it manages to provide a flexible set of features with high performance.
